website_summaries.verdict: A great supplement to help prevent dental problems for your cat before they start.
pros: Features cranberry powder for gum health, probiotics to prevent plaque, and natural zeolites to also help prevent plaque
Designed to be sprinkled daily on your cat's food and most cats like the taste
cons: Better as a preventative supplement rather than eliminating current dental problems

website_summaries.verdict: Works between dental cleanings to keep the dog's teeth clean and breath fresh.
pros: Provides significant results within a few weeks of continuous use
Easy powder to use, as you simply sprinkle it over the dog's food, and it will break down the bacteria that causes plaque to form on the teeth
Most dogs like the taste and smell of the powder, so it shouldn't affect appetite
cons: Doesn't alleviate bad breath problems for every dog

customer_reviews.title: This works!!
customer_reviews.text: One of my dogs had redness in a portion of his gum and it started smelling bad even though he is still 3 years old. I brush and remove tartar (it is difficult to clean his mouth because his teeth are so tiny - He is a Chihuahua) but I did not see a big improvement. When i was looking for the products that may help resolving the problem I came to find this product. I gave this power for last 5 days by sprinkling over meals and I already see the improvement. Redness on his gum is gone and gum in the section looks firm, and his mouth does not smell now.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Tail

customer_reviews.title: Clears up stinky breath!
customer_reviews.text: My cat has bad teeth and her breath is terrible. This clears up that problem quickly and it is helping to keep her teeth clean in the process. I bought the bites for her but she had a hard time chewing them. The powder can be easily mixed into her wet food in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: jerana72

customer_reviews.title: Caused vomiting
customer_reviews.text: I slowly introduced this into my cat's wet food by giving less than the recommended dose. She hesitated to touch her food with this product mixed in, but eventually did. And then it all came back up a few hours. My cat is 1.5 years old and has never vomited before and nothing new has been added to her diet except this. I won't be using this again.
customer_reviews.author: DS1979

customer_reviews.title: Caused Allergic Reaction
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this, also because my dog actually loved the taste. But after a few days on it I realized that he was suddenly scratching his ears a lot. When I took a look the ears were highly inflamed and covered in little pustules. After discontinuing the product things began to improve, but the pustules have left a lot of marks in this ears that will take time to resolve. My advice: if you have a highly allergic dog (ours has a ton of food allergies and is on RC Ultamino because it’s the only food for him), stay away. I’m really upset with myself that I put him through this.
customer_reviews.author: Kallista

customer_reviews.title: Inner seal is broken... product works
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a replacement since inner seal is broken. Not willing to take the risk. VeriScience need to work on packaging. They even has a warning “DO NOT USE IF INNER SEAL IS BROKEN” on the bottle. Updates: -received replacement quickly -product works. My 16 yrs old Chihuahua & 6 yrs old Toy Poodle breath is much better only after a week. Add two stars to 4 stars.
customer_reviews.author: CA resident

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my dog’s teeth clean
customer_reviews.text: My homeopathic veterinarian recommended this product to reduce plaque formation on my Pomeranian’s teeth. He doesn’t seem to mind me adding it to his food. It seems to be helping. Since he’s 12 yrs old, I want to make sure his teeth stay clean so he doesn’t have to have anesthesia again for a dental cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: P. Young

customer_reviews.title: Careful using for weak or older dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I didn't document whether or not my dogs' teeth are cleaner, but I believe they are. HOWEVER, I won't be using the product again. I am suspicious that it may be the cause of toxic shock in my 15-year-old dog. My 5-year-old has tolerated it well. I cannot prove it, so please do your own research. My dog is old, could have gotten into something else, but I almost lost her over the weekend, and she is still not out of woods. I feel compelled to issue just a word of caution, with no proof this was the cause.
customer_reviews.author: The Ridge Runner

customer_reviews.title: 2nd bottle different (and much worse) than the first
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 bottles. My first bottle was a white powder and it worked great. Cleared up the stinky breath an plaque issues. I was very excited to have found this item. But, the second bottle I ordered was more of a tan powder, had small clumps, and doesn’t work at all. The product seems inconsistent. Good luck! Hope you get a good one. Update: After 4 bottles I’ve had 2 white powder bottles and 2 tan powder bottles. The white powder still seems to be more effective. 🤷🏻‍♂️ At least Amazon is being consistently inconsistent.
customer_reviews.author: John Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Made 2 small dogs vomit after 1/2 doses.
customer_reviews.text: I have two 16 lbs dogs, a full Rat Terrier and a Chihuahua/Rat Terrier. This product made one dog vomit the first night after one dose (although I wasn't shocked because she has a sensitive stomach). The second night after the second dose it made my other dog throw up, and when that happened I knew it was bad because he NEVER throws up. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: Carilyn S.

customer_reviews.title: my pet would not eat this
customer_reviews.text: No fault of the company, but I wish there was a trial sized container available to taste test with your pet!
customer_reviews.author: C. Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Makes dogs sick
customer_reviews.text: I'm sad that this made my dogs so ill, because I did notice an immediate improvement in their teeth when I started sprinkling it on their food. I did a small amount and after 2 days they both had uncontrollable diarrhea. Nothing else in their diet or routine had changed. After 2 weeks, I figured I would give it another try to confirm this was the cause. I did another small amount mixed into food and sure enough they were having digestive upset later that afternoon. Good for the teeth, bad for the gut. Disappointed I spent $15 just to make my dogs sick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helps with odor and plaque
customer_reviews.text: Have been using for a couple of months at the recommendation of my Veterinarian, and so far, seems to help a great deal with breath odor and plaque build up. It's an inexpensive product that I'm hoping will pay for itself by avoiding more frequent professional cleanings. It has a vanilla smell and my dogs gobble it up with no problem. If you're using dry kibble, you will have to sprinkle it over the food and shake the bowl quite a bit to get it to adhere.
customer_reviews.author: Tzipi

customer_reviews.title: Taste terrible - not for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: I've been giving my dog Dental probiotics for a few years. During Coronavirus I couldn't get my usual brand so I decided to try this one. My one dog literally refused to eat when this product was on his food. My other dog is one of those who will eat anything and he didn't mind at all. I decided to try a taste of it and it's very very bitter. Amazon has my previous brand in stock again and I will be going back to what worked. It really doesn't matter how effective is product is if the dog will not consume it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mccormick

customer_reviews.title: not for us
customer_reviews.text: Idk, my dogs still eat with this on top of their food but I feed raw so idk if that has anything to do with it. I have not noticed any measurable difference since starting this product (maybe 2 months, ill have to double check). I have 3 dogs & i do not use the recommended amount twice daily. I would go through 1 bottle a week. I just sprinkle some on top of each meal. The amounts they want you to use is crazy. Maybe this product is better for smaller animals, not 50 lbs +. I just see no improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Marie

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how it works on teeth, I got it as a preventative measure (kitty hates teeth brushing despite trying to acclimate him from 1 mo old), and his teeth are still white. However, I put a little plain on his plate and he licked it right up and sniffed around for more, so that's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel and Alena

customer_reviews.title: This poison cost me $200.00 in vet bills!
customer_reviews.text: This product made my dog so sick, that I had to take her to the vet. She had severe diarrhea for 3 days and all night long. It took a month to get her digestive system regulated again. Extremely disappointed and angry. Especially now that I see now that they closed the return window already.
customer_reviews.author: ushouldno

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old dachshund after my friend recommended it. My dachshund has really bad teeth (typical for the breed) but he has health issues which prevent him from getting his teeth cleaned. His breath was TERRIBLE, almost nauseating, until we gave him this! Now, his breath doesn't smell like roses or anything, but it is significantly better. I can only imagine that it is going to continue to get better with use!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Get this for your dog!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for almost a year now. My dogs have noticeably whiter teeth and their breath no longer stinks. It doesn’t “scent” their breath, it just eliminates the odor... their breath just doesn’t smell like anything. I sprinkle it on their food and they seem to really like the taste. I have 3 dogs (20 lbs, 55 lbs, and 70lbs) and they eat twice a day. One bottle will last about 2 months. To be honest I don’t really follow the dosing instructions, I just sprinkle a little on their food for each meal. I’m probably using less then the recommended amount, but it’s worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Dowding

customer_reviews.title: It WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started using this on Sunday evening for my 4 year old Lab/Golden Cross for his bad breath. His teeth are brushed weekly but still had bad breath. Since starting on Sunday, I woke today, on a Tuesday morning to my dog in my face trying to get me out of bed so he could have breakfast.....I was shocked that his breath NO longer stunk!!! After 1.5 days the bad breath is gone!! I will definitely continue to use this product. I am gonna experiment to see if the results are the same if used 1x a day vs 2x day. I’ve already recommended this product to friends
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Increased Price,  Quality has severely diminished!!!
customer_reviews.text: Price has increased by 25%, but quality has decreased by 75%!!!

customer_reviews.title: Dental health and plaque prevention
customer_reviews.text: I have been putting this into my dog's food every day for a while now. I do see a difference in her teeth. Before using this our last visit had me receiving an estimate for cleaning and extractions. She needs extensive treatment. I'm afraid to have her go under the anesthesia. I'm hoping that this stuff will lessen the amount of treatment she will be receiving. I know it has to eventually be done, but I'm thinking this product is giving me a bit more time.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Roy

customer_reviews.title: Put Sunglasses on, Bright White!
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t think our 12 yr old Spaniel would like it along w our 5 yr GSD, That NEVER happens!! It’s took about half a bottle through before I realized this stuff truly works! It has a scent of licorice. We sprinkle it , added a smidge of water to dry food, ensurOmg every piece is coated. Wow- big change in teeth and breath. I should’ve done a before & after, but I really didn’t think it would work. My mom uses it on her Maltese that has a cleft lip. His mouth had smelly rotten, and now his teeth are super clean too. So three dogs have clean pretty teeth and they all love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: AMB

customer_reviews.title: Had to quit use!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this product and the chews, as a close friend uses them for her Dalmatian and recommended it to me. My two little dogs, who are picky, ate it with no issues until about a week into using it, then the diarrhea started. My only explanation is their smaller systems could not handle the ingredients. Disappointing for sure but perhaps for dogs under 10lbs they need to rethink the amount suggested.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia R Reid

customer_reviews.title: Bad taste. Doesn’t like the smell. Might actually be beneficial though!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this. My cat doesn’t like the taste or smell. He can smell it and doesn’t want to eat the food. He tastes it and stops eating. I have to wet his food anyway because he has stomatitis so it masks the smell and taste. I’ve only been using it about a week but I think it may be helping his teeth and gums. I’ll be back to write a second review for the actual benefits for my cat.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Yorkie won’t eat it.
customer_reviews.text: Got a bad report on my Yorkie’s dental health. He refuses to let me brush his teeth, so I got this powder and CET chews. I’ve tried mixing it in with wet food, chicken broth, even a little bit of cat food in the mix. He takes a couple of bites and then walks away. :( Do i stay persistent in the hopes that he eventually eats it and goes hungry for a bit? Kind of at a loss here. At least the cats will still eat with it in their food, so it’s gettjng some use.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Davis

customer_reviews.title: my dogs absolutely love it & that is the main reason for the ...
customer_reviews.text: I am kinda undecided on this product although I have ordered it twice. I'm not sure if it is helping my dogs teeth but I'm sure it can't hurt. I will say this...my dogs absolutely love it & that is the main reason for the 4 star review. Like other reviewers we call it doggie salt & they really love their doggie salt. That is one of the main reasons I reordered it. We love our dogs. They love it. It has good ingredients so I will probably order again. Pros: My dogs love it. Good ingredients. Cons: Kinda pricy. Would order more often if it were a bit cheaper. Not sure if it has helped their teeth.
customer_reviews.author: DeliQueen

customer_reviews.title: ...it certianly helps his breath!
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is picky and he will still eat his food with this on top! Sometimes, he even starts eating once I sprinkle it on. I am not sure of the long-term effects, but it certianly helps his breath. Our vet recommended this since we can't keep his teeth clean enough and when we adopted him his teeth were in pretty awful shape. I will update to 5 stars if I see an improvement in plaque in addition to breath.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING. I was skeptical about how effective this would be but let me say this stuff WORKS. We have one geriatric dog with VERY awful breath that will singe your nose hairs off...But since introducing this his breath has greatly improved. We don’t brush nearly as often as we should so this really helps curtail the odor and is simple to use and dogs eat up their food and seem to like it. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: Great for gas! Works wonders on Frenchies!
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 french Bulldogs who are very VERY gassy... weve tried several products and this is the only one that seems to help!
customer_reviews.author: JessicaRN

customer_reviews.title: Don’t hesitate, it works !
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I thought it was a shot in the dark that a sprinkle of powder would make a significant difference, but I am blown away ! This product is amazing and absolutely works . My puppers has Megaesophagus and from prior regurgitation and pneumonia his breath had a certain odor he had never had before , and now he’s not only feeling better , but his breath is nice and fresh ! Love this product !
customer_reviews.author: Peyton

customer_reviews.title: Improved dental health and better “dog breath”!!
customer_reviews.text: My vet prescribed this product to prevent tartar build up on my dogs teeth. I sprinkle it on their evening food and they don’t seem to notice it at all so it must taste fine! One of the dogs is rather finicky and she doesn’t mind it. My vet states she notices improved dental health and their breath is definitely better! I only brush their teeth once per week because I have to trick them and tackle them to do so and so I know this product is helping because the teeth brushing isn’t done well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cat throw up
customer_reviews.text: This product makes my cat puke when I put it in her food. I was very disappointed because she needs all the help she can get with her teeth as she’s had a few removed due to infection. This product is now useless to me because I don’t want to make my cat sick :(
customer_reviews.author: Mary Allison Loh

customer_reviews.title: Dental Dog Care
customer_reviews.text: My dog food specialist recommended this product to me. I don't brush my dog's teeth regularly as needed. Unfortunately I didn't start when they were young as would have helped. This is nice for two reasons: It helps my dog's breath and it will loosen plaque when you do brush to make it easier and less painful for your dog. Also my dogs eat it with their food and never seem to mind.
customer_reviews.author: Gussie

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: Repeat purchaser. I had my dogs teeth cleaned when she was three yrs old and the vet has not had to clean them since. She is now eleven. I also give her a dental chew in the evening. She has never had bad breath! When she was young I tried brushing her teeth but she didn’t like it. So this has been a very effective dental care plan for her
customer_reviews.author: nancy mccurdy

customer_reviews.title: My babies avoid it like a plague
customer_reviews.text: Well my yorkies don't like it all. My babies just let it set all day. They have to be starving to eat it. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: EV

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: The vet recommended this and it was half the price here as what she was selling it for. The dogs enjoy the taste and have not had any digestive issues from it. As for if it works I can not tell yet as I am sure it takes time and it is hard to really track progress when I am also using toothpaste and gel as the vet said to throw everything at the teeth so that they have the best chance to stay good.
customer_reviews.author: Rainissa

customer_reviews.title: Seems to help with bad breath and picky eaters love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for about a week but I have to say I'm impressed!! I have a great dane that has a stinky mouth and it smells much better now! I also have two incredibly picky little dogs (french bulldog and shih tzu) who are INCREDIBLY picky and never want to eat they're food, but eat it all right away with the powder on it! I'd buy it again just for that!!! My cats also seem to really enjoy it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work.
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks of trying it out, I do see a nice difference in white-ness of the teeth. Teeth are now much brighter and the dogs seem to have no problem with the powder. I kind of wish it came with a tiny little scoop inside the bottle so you could just use that to scoop and pour it in the dog food for more accurate measurements. But I've just been sprinkling it on the food.
customer_reviews.author: MistahBlob

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of four cats agree
customer_reviews.text: 3 out of 4 very picky cats will eat but only over wet food. I am already noticing that their breath is better though and that is only after approximately two weeks of use. If the other picky cat would eat it would probably be a five star review. The only other mild complaint I have is that it seems to go everywhere when you try to shake it out of the top. It works much better to scoop it out but the top is very skinny so it's hard to get the scoop in without spilling. Overall I would recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: BellaNova

customer_reviews.title: Excess calcium not recommended for feline kidney health
customer_reviews.text: This product should not be recommended for cats due to the additional calcium that their kidneys would have to process. Protecting your cat's kidneys by avoiding excess minerals can go a long way in preventing chronic kidney disease (CKD). Check out catinfo.org to learn more about what goes in cat foods and what you should avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy and cheap. Beats brushing any day.
customer_reviews.text: Update: found that my dog was allergic to this product, had a lot of issues with scratching his body and watery eyes. I was so disappointed as I really liked the product in the concept of it, but we had to stop using it. Initially I had rated this with five stars, but I had to change it to three based on experience. So far, so good. My dog's breath changed for the better, so I know it's working. Will have to see what the next vet visit brings to know just how well it's working.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly A. Seitz

customer_reviews.title: His mouth smelled like a fetid swamp prior to using this product
customer_reviews.text: Have been sprinkling this on our dog's food at each feeding for the last few years on the advice of our vet. His mouth smelled like a fetid swamp prior to using this product. After the first few weeks of regular use that problem was gone. The dog's teeth weren't in the best of shape and he is too old to be anesthesized for a proper cleaning. This product has helped tremendously.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for my pooch!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great, cleared up my dogs red puffy gums and got rid of most of her tartar. However, she still had stinky breath until I got a water additive as well. I did take off one star and will be discontinuing use only bc of her allergies. It makes her flaky and causes her to shed and itch more than usual.
customer_reviews.author: Dawkir1

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Cats went for a dental cleaning last week and for 2 days they didnt have the regular stinky cat breath. I have been using this in their food nightly and the stinky cat breath has returned. Not sure exactly what its supposed to do but I figured to start them on it immediately after the cleaning as a fresh slate.
customer_reviews.author: G-Unit

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!!!
customer_reviews.text: The vet told me that my cat needed his teeth cleaned because his gums were red. The price tag for that came in around $700 and I just couldn't afford to do that. So I searched for alternative assistance and after two months of using this product his gums are healthy. I'm so happy. It's a great, affordable solution to keep kitty's teeth and gums healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Dube

customer_reviews.title: fresh breath!!!!  finally!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My PWC (Corgi) had a broken tooth extracted in November. Then in February, the bad breath returned. Ugh! So I took him to the vet and they only found tartar, not a broken tooth. Vet and staff suggested a few options and this product was one of them. So glad I tried it. Pleasant licorice-ish smell. My dog loves it. Breath is good now! I highly recommend that you try this product.
customer_reviews.author: horse lover

customer_reviews.title: Get it before you're too late
customer_reviews.text: These ladies make some great stuff. My cats will not eat it but the dogs love it. Makes their breath smell fantastic but it smells a lot like licorice and mint. Great for preventing or lessening tartar and bad breath. Get some before you have to spend hundreds on teeth cleaning or, heaven forbid, costly and painful extractions. They're worth it!
customer_reviews.author: AYonko

customer_reviews.title: Saw a difference
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this stuff on my cats for a month now and I have started to notice a difference. My older cats’ back tooth was a more darker brown color and about half of it is a light brown now! I give it to my cats 2X a week in their wet food.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina

customer_reviews.title: This works extremely well
customer_reviews.text: I had both dogs teeth cleaned. However, the little one still had horrible breath.This product works so well. It took 2 1/2 weeks for her breath to go from toxic to sweet. I will reorder for life.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my vet
customer_reviews.text: Recommended by my vet. Sprinkle it on the dog's food. It works well!!!!!!!!! Love it. Am purchasing it on a regular bases. The product always gets here by or before the date promised. I highly recommend this product. --- Since I wrote my initial review (the start of this review), I took my Yorkie to the vet to get her teeth checked and cleaned. My vet was amazed! The vet said she has never seen a Yorkie that was 8 years old with such good teeth. She said most dogs of that breed that are 8 years old have multiple extractions. My sweet baby just got her teeth polished. This product is the best. I wholeheartedly recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Vet recommended
customer_reviews.text: On recommendation from our vet we got this to cut down on our dogs developing gum disease and to avoid another expensive cleaning. Our vet knows her stuff and we trust her advice. Oh, need to mention, we feed the dogs human grade food. I do try almost everything they get. This powder ha absolutely no taste or oder.
customer_reviews.author: JosephTop Contributor: Cycling

customer_reviews.title: Dog's Breath Improved on the first dose!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something easy. This is it! I've tried sprays and foams, water additives. This sprinkles on the food out of an easy flip top bottle (has an opening for a measuring spoon too). My dog won't eat now until I sprinkle it on his food! Doesn't even have an odor. Great product. I'm Amazed!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work on my dog
customer_reviews.text: We have a 15-lb Dachshund who receives this powder over his meal and gobbles it right up without complaint. The vet tells me that Dachshunds are prone to dental problems - and he will need formal cleanings - but he seems to be fending off tartar and such. I can't honestly say if the powder is the cause, but I don't see a downside in continuing to use the product.
customer_reviews.author: The Real Bob

customer_reviews.title: Not Sold On This Product...
customer_reviews.text: Being an LVT, I have of course come across this product in my industry. I personally do not believe it works, at least for my cat. Her breath has not necessarily improved, and the level of calculus that develops varies between each animal and their diet. I gave this product several months, and will continue to finish the bottle and monitor for results. But so far I am not sold nor impressed. It was worth a try though.
customer_reviews.author: SaffaExpatLVT

customer_reviews.title: No change in my dogs' teeth using this product
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because it was supposed to help with my dogs' teeth; no plaque or tartar sticking to their teeth, however, that's not the case. There's been no change in my dogs' teeth using this product, and they still have bad breath which this product was supposed to help also.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Echeverria

customer_reviews.title: Dental Health
customer_reviews.text: My vet started my dogs on this product over the summer. I’ve used many different types of prevention products, so far so good! All three of my dogs teeth look good!
customer_reviews.author: Viola F. Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Smells but works.
customer_reviews.text: It smells slightly like licorice and our dog is not really a big fan. That being said, it does seem to be working. If your dog isn’t a picky eater, I say go for it. We practically have to beg our dog to eat his normal food so it’s no surprise he doesn’t like the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Great Probiotic for Dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My pets eat a quarter teaspoon every day! Probiotics are so good (for all of us) and there are some good live cultures in this powder, that you shake onto your pet’s food like a salt shaker. Taste difference is negligible and my dog’s barely notice it on their food.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Zuckero

customer_reviews.title: Not so sure this works ??
customer_reviews.text: I use this in addition to a water additive. I ran out of the water additive and was only using this, and I'm not so sure this works too well. With the water additive there was a noticeable difference in the horrible doggy breath in our home.
customer_reviews.author: STACEE

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I started to give this to my schnauzer exactly 2 months ago. His gum was swollen, and red. Now it looks much-much better, and his breath is much fresher now too. My dog loves the taste, I just pour it to his dry food, and he can't wait to eat - the food itself never gets this reaction. I will definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Good option for oral maintenance.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that this product would do much for my elderly dog’s horrible breath. However, pretty quickly her breath was smelling better and I’m less worried about her mouth health in general. I believe this product works.
customer_reviews.author: agenthandy

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh! This stuff almost killed my dog! I’ve been at the emergency vet since 11.am it’s now 6.pm I have a toy poodle, 6lbs I eased in on the dosage and on day 3 just as others have stated, she began to have violent diarrhea and vomiting. All nighters. If you love your dog as I do, don’t use this product. Oh and my vet bill $298.
customer_reviews.author: jamie goldberg bowers

customer_reviews.title: Eating Impediment
customer_reviews.text: My cat would not eat her cat food when I sprinkled this stuff on her canned cat food !
customer_reviews.author: Stewart Chalamidas M.D. a humble Student of the Course in Miracles.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! Legit!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would have taken a picture of my dog's teeth before starting this product! They were horrible and caked with plaque. I could tell a big difference within about 2 weeks. We have been using the product for a month now and my vet was very pleased with our results. Will continue using this!
customer_reviews.author: R. Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product to keep your pets teeth white. This will slow down plague on your pets teeth and eliminate bad breath. But you still will have to review your pets teeth and Gums on annual health check. Our 3 eat it on top of there AM dog meal without problems. This product was recommended by out local Pet specialty store as well out Vet
customer_reviews.author: Dogowner

customer_reviews.title: Not sure...
customer_reviews.text: It’s difficult to say whether or not this product is doing much of anything, but I will continue using it. Worst case scenario is that I’m throwing money away on either this or future dental expenses down the road.
customer_reviews.author: J.K.

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by vet
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended this to decrease plaque buildup on dog's teeth. Easy to use and dog appears to love it. Will be interesting in a year to see if it has held the existing plaque in place, as vet said it would only prevent further buildup.
customer_reviews.author: kati518

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money.
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product to my dogs for 2 months, and I saw no difference. The product did not work on my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: jumping jack

customer_reviews.title: My dog rates it 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don’t know how well this stuff works, I think it helps, but all I know is that one of my dogs LOVES this powder. He will literally wait for me to sprinkle his food before eating and he will stare at the counter for the bottle. My other dog doesn’t really care if it’s there or not, but I’ll probably continue to buy it since it’s supposed to help their breath and the one loves it a lot
customer_reviews.author: Carly Dufficy

customer_reviews.title: It works for my 22 lbs Rat Terrier
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly this actually works on my pup. I can really tell a difference when we don’t include it in his food. However, I always use more than what is recommended for his weight. Simply because when other members in the family feed him, they don’t use it 🤷🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: gnaff9093

customer_reviews.title: great product! One of my dogs had a dental ...
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my dogs teeth clean, great product! One of my dogs had a dental this year, after which I started using this product. I was told by the vet that my other dog would need a dental last year. Couldn't afford two in a year, so I started giving her this product. This year, when the vet saw her, she said beautiful teeth. The Perio Support had reversed some of the problems she had. I highly endorse.
customer_reviews.author: Casilu Neal

customer_reviews.title: Significantly improved our dog's dental health!
customer_reviews.text: It took a few try to get our dog in board with this stuff on her food -- we had to introduce it VERY slowly over several weeks/months, but we now put in on her food every time she eats and her gums are in excellent shape! The black tartar is gone and we can actually see pink! HEr breath is still kickin' though, so we hope it'll improve that over the next few months. We've been using this product for about a year and it has really helped.
customer_reviews.author: Brian S. Schatz

customer_reviews.title: Has already helped my dogs teeth and breath tremendously!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs and my cats have no issue eating their food with the sprinkles on it and I have already noticed a difference in my dogs teeth and her breath as opposed to just brushing, in just a couple weeks! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Now easier to shake out of container
customer_reviews.text: Based on the vet's recommendation, I've been putting this on my dogs' food for more than a year. I can't say if it helps them because I don't have a "control group." But the product in the most recent bottle I bought is a finer texture, so it flows more easily from the shaker bottle. I like that.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: My dog will not touch it and I’m allergic to it
customer_reviews.text: I cannot give an honest opinion about the product because my dog will not go near it and also because I must allergic to it because my nose itches like crazy after first opening the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Keep your kitty's oral health in check with Perio Support!
customer_reviews.text: My sweet kitty has feline stomatitis. I was given this product by the vet and now purchase it on Amazon. I make homemade food for "Ben" and Vetri-Science Perio Support is added to the recipe every time. His oral health has held steady with no more extractions.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Poodle doesn’t seem to mind it.. & it works!
customer_reviews.text: Our poodle is a little picky and only eats his dog food if he is really hungry...but If and when he eats his puppy food— he seems not to mind the sprinkling of this on his dry food. I actually think he has a better breath and whiter teeth!
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: works very well
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I had to stop using this powder after a few days because it really upset my dogs stomach. I was told during my last vet visit that my 9 year old shepherd mix has “early periodontal disease” and they recommended a period powder. I am still giving this product 4 stars because after only a few days of giving it to her, i saw a difference in her teeth! If your dog has a sensitive stomach, i recommend giving them less than the bottle says to start.
customer_reviews.author: Julieg

customer_reviews.title: you know what, I didnt expect this to work ...
customer_reviews.text: you know what, I didnt expect this to work but I think it did. my dog has rancid breath, and I don't think it took it away but it definitely minimized it. He has this Hot breath, and I think it took the hot breath away. still kind of stinky but.... he is a dog lol:)
customer_reviews.author: Noet Beeler

customer_reviews.title: Didn't help bad breath.
customer_reviews.text: I used this on my 3 dogs for a month at the recommended amount but didn't notice any improvement in their breath. I'm sure it helps to keep their teeth clean, but two of my three have death-breath and I am still in search of anything that might help it (I already brush their teeth regularly).
customer_reviews.author: Mrs FantTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t wokr
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for my dog after over a month use. Bad breath and plaque was still apparent.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of things to get my dogs to have good breath, this product is great! I brush my dogs teeth and have a vet cleaning every two years. When I started to use this product with in three/four days their breath was not stinky anymore. Will continue to buy this. It is very easy to use, I just sprinkle on my dogs food.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Vet Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My friend is a veterinarian and she recommended I buy this for my dog’s awful breath . It works really well. It has cut down how bad his breath was. He’s seen me add it to the food and he still eats it , so it must not taste bad either
customer_reviews.author: LBurleson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product for my pup!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would try this and boy was I pleasantly surprised. This actually work and my pups teeth look pretty good, very easy to use, just sprinkle on food. I highly recommend and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria S.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with the change of flavor.
customer_reviews.text: For some reason the ingredients must have changed as my dog loved it before and now he won’t touch it. I smelled it and it smelled a lot different. I didn’t even like the smell. I threw it all out. It had a celery smell first and then it had an anise smell. I threw out 6 bottles.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lampman

customer_reviews.title: Did nothing
customer_reviews.text: This did nothing for my 8lb pomeranian. It didn't cause any problems, but was not helpful. I had previously used a seaweed looking supplement for his teeth that was helpful, but decided to try this. Definitely switching back because his plaque is building up and his breath is rank!
customer_reviews.author: Mowlee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, add to food.
customer_reviews.text: Got my elderly dog's teeth clean. I was recommended this product to prevent further plaque. I just add to her food once a day. She gobbles it up. Will let you know more at next checkup at end of month.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: really works
customer_reviews.text: My dog is picky and he loves it. Or doesn't notice it. ? It really works. I'm just hoping this is the exact same that my vet was giving me. I believe it does. Because of heart issues, my Teddy can't have his teeth professionally cleaned anymore. This seems to be a miracle item.
customer_reviews.author: Jan L. Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Recommneded by my Vet.
customer_reviews.text: Vet recommended I put this on my older dog's food. It keeps plaque from sticking to the teeth. The cost is double at my Vet. so I purchases this from Amazon and it is the exact same product.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M Hahn

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. All 3 of my dogs eat it well & all like it. We have noticed a great difference in my 9 year old pitbulls breath! Will purchase again!
customer_reviews.author: KK Webb

customer_reviews.title: It tastes awful to my cat and to me!
customer_reviews.text: The ingredients were the feature that prompted be to buy this but my cat wouldn't touch anything with it on or in it. So, I decided to taste it. I only tapped maybe an 1/8 tsp and it felt like it was burning my tongue!!! No wonder my fella didn't touch it!
customer_reviews.author: Happy Camper

customer_reviews.title: Well, it helped with the tartar on the kitties' ...
customer_reviews.text: Well, it helped with the tartar on the kitties' teeth... However, we think it is the cause of our 2-year old male cat breaking out and scratching his neck raw. The vet said that is usually due to a food allergy - this was the only thing that had changed. If your kitty has allergies or is very sensitive to irritants, proceed with caution.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Mayer

customer_reviews.title: Used this product for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Perio-Support for several years on my Sheltie's that we showed and now that we are down to one pet Sheltie, I continue to use this product. My Sheltie is 9 year's old and have only put her under twice to have her teeth cleaned and that was because she had some surgery done, so decided to have her teeth done at the same time. My Vet can hardly believe how good my dog's teeth are at her age, but the combination of this product, plus brushing her teeth every other day have made such a difference. I would highly recommend this product to other's, but also suggest bushing your dog's teeth along with it.
customer_reviews.author: CW

customer_reviews.title: Great dental product!
customer_reviews.text: This powder has really helped my dog's teeth. It seems to upset one of my dogs' stomach, but I think it just depends on the dog. The other two love the taste and their teeth and gums look much better!!
customer_reviews.author: Stacey Paige

customer_reviews.title: This did an amazing job.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well! Didn’t want to risk anesthesia on my 11 year old Lab sisters but I needed to clean their teeth. This did an amazing job.
customer_reviews.author: RamItOne

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome! I knew there was a possibility of the side effect of diarrhea based on reviews, but I decided to give it a try! AMAZING!!!!!!!! Give it a go!
customer_reviews.author: Brook Dougherty

customer_reviews.title: Not a gimick! Really helps
customer_reviews.text: Works great to keep "death breath" at bay! I grew up with Labs that would occasionally have stinky breath, but now we have Boxers and their dental problems are crazy! We would brush their teeth and nearly gag from the smell....it was horrible! When our vet recommended Perio Support, I figured they were just trying to sell us some supplement, but we tried it and it has worked wonders!! I'm no longer embarrassed when they great company
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Product changed
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product consistently for the past year or so. We loved it! The product was white, and all of the sudden it’s beige now with an entirely different consistency. I have received two bottles now where the product looks odd, and also smells like brown sugar. Not sure if it still works, but I no longer feel comfortable giving it to my pup. Think I’m going to try another product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Kohn

customer_reviews.title: Performs as advertised. Real white teeth!
customer_reviews.text: Really helps with the tarter build up. We feed dry food, use Dentastix but still have some tarter build up. This powder really does the trick. Our dogs teeth are so white and he loves the powder on his food. I think it smells like malted milk but who knows... I just know it is worth using because it works!
customer_reviews.author: WNCChip

customer_reviews.title: Works as recommended
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommended by my dog’s Vet since my girl won’t stand for having he teeth brushed. It’s been 5 years and so far so good. The Vet is pleased and I love the fresh breath and lack of a tussle. :) Very easy to use, just put it their food. No issue with affecting the foods taste either. Noel approved!
customer_reviews.author: Noel's Mom

product_meta.title: VETRISCIENCE Laboratories- Perio Support, Dental Health Powder for Cats and Dogs, 4.2 OZ
product_meta.description: Stop chasing your dog or cat around the house with a toothbrush! Perio Support dental powder is easy to administer and works organically on the bacteria in your pet’s mouth, gums and digestive tract to fight plaque buildup and freshen breath. According to the American Veterinary Dental Society, 80-85% of all pets have periodontal disease. Perio Support can help.Perio Support is designed for use in between scheduled cleanings to help maintain clean teeth and fresh breath. It is formulated to help control plaque formation and to support gum health. Perio Support includes: natural zeolites, cranberry, a source of antioxidants and bioflavonoids that support reduction of undesirable bacteria; taurine and zinc, which work together to support gum tissue health and strength; and beneficial, direct-fed microbials lactobacillus acidophilus and enterococcus faecium, which help restore microbial balance in the mouth and displace unhealthy plaque-causing bacteria.
feature_bullets: Perio Support is designed for use between dental cleanings to support clean teeth and fresh breath.
Perio Support reduced the prevalence of plaque by 20% and tartar by 18% in a double-blind testing of dogs in just 28 days!
Perio Support is a tasty, aromatic powder that’s easy to use and easy to remember.
Perio Support is a convenient way to promote dental health without the hassle and mess of brushing.
Perio Support contains Natural Zeolites that help prevent plaque formation and probiotics to attack bad breath-causing bacteria.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
